item.title: Storm Rider
item.description: The Grand Duel, also known as Storm Rider and The Big Showdown, is a 1972 Spaghetti Western film directed by Giancarlo Santi, who had previously worked as Sergio Leone's assistant director on The Good, the Bad and the Ugly and Once Upon a Time in the West. The film stars Lee Van Cleef as a sheriff who seeks justice for a man accused of murder.

item.title: Man of the East
item.description: Man of the East is a 1972 Italian spaghetti western film directed by Enzo Barboni starring Terence Hill.

item.title: ... and called it the Holy Spirit
item.description: He Was Called Holy Ghost is a 1971 Italian Spaghetti Western-comedy film written and directed by Roberto Mauri and starring Vassili Karis. It was followed by Return of the Holy Ghost (1972), still directed by Mauri and with Karis in the title role.
